attributes.action: Install hydrotherapy pools at all public leisure pool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is insufficient access to hydrotherapy pools. 
Many health issues respond well to this treatment and early intervention is always more beneficial. Only a hydrotherapy pool with the higher water temperature enables the user to exercise in comfort and safety. 
We request that legislation is passed to require all new and existing pools, private and public, to provide this service at a reasonable cost.
